page.title: 11BUILDING HOUSES,WINGERWORTH
page.content: The sales representative at SNW told us that it takes about 16 weeks to build a house. Each one needs the following materials: bricks, breeze blocks, paramount, plaster, cement, water, water boarding, glass, wood, nails, loft insulation, rockwool dry mineral fibre, pipes, paint, roof tiles and handles. We then asked in what order does each house get built.{ 1.}Foundations {2.}First-lift brickwork {3.}Roof joists{4.}Tile roof{5.}Electric wiring, pipe work for toilets,sinks and bath. Partition walls, staircase, door frames etc. {6.}Plaster house {7.}Put in sockets, lights etc. Fix in bath, toilet, and sinks. Fix on doors, handles, skirting boards. {8.}Paint house. {9.}Erect fences and turf garden. {10. }Move in.
